sentences.en: Are there physical reactions as a pounding heart or sweaty palms?
sentences.cn: 是否有诸如心碰碰乱跳或手心出汗等生理反应 呢 ?

sentences.en: Finally, with sweaty palms, I lifted the receiver and dialed.
sentences.cn: 终于我用发汗的手拿起话筒拨了那个号.

sentences.en: He felt all hot and sweaty.
sentences.cn: 他感觉全身发热，满身是汗。
他擦了擦满是汗水的手掌。

sentences.en: Her forehead was sweaty from the pain she was in.
sentences.cn: 她因疼痛额头布满了汗珠.

sentences.en: His palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy.
sentences.cn: 他的手掌已经出汗, 膝盖颤抖, 手臂沉重.

sentences.en: Hours later and Camacho's back - he of the sweaty armpits and parabolic gestures.
sentences.cn: 几小时后卡马乔回来了,带着他多汗的腋下和抛物线姿势.

sentences.en: I was boiling hot and sweaty.
If you do something, you'll be all sweaty.
sentences.cn: 如果你干点事, 你浑身是汗.

sentences.en: Powdering a sweaty nose will only block up the pores and make the skin more uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 往出汗的鼻子上扑粉只会堵塞毛孔，使皮肤更加不舒服。

sentences.en: The man in neat sweaty sweater seated hellomself in the rear.
sentences.cn: 穿整洁的汗湿毛衣的男子在后面就坐.

sentences.en: The man in neat sweaty sweater seated himself in the rear.
sentences.cn: 穿整洁的汗湿毛衣的男子在后面就坐。

sentences.en: We came home hot and sweaty after the day’s work.
sentences.cn: 一天工作之后，我们回到家时热得满身是汗。

words.tran_cn: 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂
出汗；辛苦工作；懊恼；结水珠
使出汗；流出；使干苦活；剥削；藉出汗减轻；焦急地期待
出汗的；吃力的；使人出汗的

trans.tran_cn: 浑身出汗的，汗臭的，吃力的，汗似的
